    Touch

    public class TouchStub
extends TouchImpl
    A NOOP touch service for use on platforms that don't support touch interaction.

    • Method Detail

      • hasTouch

        public boolean hasTouch()
        Description copied from interface: Touch
        Returns true if the underlying platform supports touch interaction. If this method returns false, listeners may still be registered with this service but they will never be notified.
        Specified by:
        hasTouch in interface Touch
        Overrides:
        hasTouch in class TouchImpl
